main.title: Create an account on Paribu.
main.description: You can review how your information is stored and used here.

legal.content1: I have read, understood, and agree to the Terms of Use and Membership Agreement.
legal.content2: I have read the Explicit Consent Text prepared for users creating an account, and I consent to the processing of my personal data within this scope.
legal.content3: I agree to receive commercial electronic messages via email, phone, and electronic communication channels within the scope of the Commercial Electronic Message Permission Information Text regarding products and services.
legal.content4: You can find information regarding the processing of personal data in the context of account creation in the Information Text.
legal.content5: You can find information on how we process and protect personal data in our Personal Data Processing and Protection Policy.

error.phone: You must enter your phone number and email address

passwordAgain.empty: You must re-enter the password you set
passwordAgain.wrong: The passwords you entered must match

error.reference: The code you entered is invalid
error.campaign: The campaign code you entered is invalid
